item.title: Flytipping along Boundary Brook Path, 14th July
item.description:
This path is great but it’s plagued by numerous litter and Flytipping points along it. Needs vigilance and regular patrols to clean it up. I’m happy to give up some of my time if we are given the materials to do the job. Sadly it’s an easy target and thoughtless people just chuck their stuff here

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 149, Sandhurst Road, Ponders End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Burnt out car abandoned, 14th July
item.description:
This burnt out car in Tillingham Way, Woodside Park N12 must be known about as there is fire warning tape close to it. However after 2 weeks the car is still there and looks awful

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tillingham Way, Woodside Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Storage box and rubbish dumped on grass, 14th July

item.title: The report's reference number is 7799794, 14th July
item.description:
According to street cleansing service level agreement its staes (Alleyways and Footpaths - 3 weekly) as you can see on the original report's reference number is 7799794 this area has not been touched for years which is cause damage to residents fencing and causing issues with rats.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holly Hill Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Delivery mopeds parked on pavement out side takeaway, 14th July
item.description:
